Name: Entente Cordiale #2
Ingredients: 5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Dry shake all ingredients together, then shake vigorously with cubed ice and double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Review: Tea tannins and zesty lemon balance rich Pedro Ximenez sherry, all layered over a cognac base.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Felix Cohen at Manhattans Project, Dalston, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Entente Cordiale #2 contains 156 calories
Garnish: Dash of Angostura Bitters drawn across foam
